attributes.action: TO STRICTLY MONITOR OUR UK BORDERS ... NOW
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: EVER SINCE WE OPENED OUR BORDERS, EVEN THOUGH WE HAVE A LOT OF GENUINE VISITORS THE REALISATON THAT WE HAVE CRIMINALS HERE THAT NO BODY ELSE WOULD HAVE IS RIDICULOUS AND TOTALLY UNFAIR ON LAW ABIDING UK CITIZENS.WE PAY TAX FOR MANY THINGS AND ONE IS TO BE PROTECTED AND TO FEEL SAFE IN OUR COUNTRY. SOMETHING THE MAJORITY DO NOT FEEL RIGHT NOW.

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
